== Main Inclusion Report for foo2zjs ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/f/foo2zjs, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** http://bugzilla.ubuntu.com/show_bug.cgi?id=17693
** There are only 2 foomatic drivers out of the foomatic tree. This is one of them.
 0. ''Security:''
** No CVE entries.
** No Secunia history.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** No showstopper Debian bugs.
** Good maintenance in Debian.
** Active upstream.
** No critical bugs in <nowiki>[[http://foo2zjs.rkkda.com/]]</nowiki>
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support. It's just a set of printer drivers.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Standard debhelper packaging, standard dpatch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
